data.author: Mike D

changelog.release_notes: Support for OAuth on Yahoo weather
fix for negative Celsius temps and metric wind speed
Use TimezoneDB API for GMT hand to account for daylight savings time in each timezone

-Improved GMT hand accuracy
-New light color scheme option
-Optional vibe on BT disconnect

data.description:
Prepare for takeoff with SkyMaster
A weather-centric analog GMT watchface with Pebble Health step count.
Battery level indicator between the 12 and 2 position (ie 9min past the hour is 90%, 3min is 30%). GMT/24hr indicator (red triangle) which can be adjusted to any timezone in settings (time indicated on a 24 hour scale, not 12 hours). Current temp, day and date always on. Quick wrist shake to show second hand and full weather info. Another shake hides second hand and weather or will auto hide after 2 minutes. Weather info includes; 
-current conditions
-daily forecast (temp range and conditions)
-Sun rise and set times
-Wind speed and chill
-% humidity 
-Current air pressure + rise/fall/steady
-Moon phase
OPTIONS:
-Light or dark color scheme
-Vibe on BT disconnect
NEW: GMT hand automatically adjust to local daylight savings time using the TimezoneDB.com API

latest_release.release_notes: Support for OAuth on Yahoo weather

data.title: SkyMaster
